DOC.brief_summary: This study intend collect safety effectiveness data Cook Injectable Small Intestinal Submucosa ( SIS )
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Safety Study Injectable SIS Critical Limb Ischemia
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis critical limb ischemia Rutherford 45 LericheFontaine IIIB Patient unable treat endovascular surgical mean Patient 's age < 21 Patient pregnant breastfeeding ( plan become pregnant within next year ) Patient previous surgery , within 30 day study procedure Patient plan surgical interventional procedure within 30 day study procedure Patient life expectancy le 1 year Patient known allergy pig pig product , religious cultural objection use pig tissue Additional restriction specify Clinical Investigation Plan
